00382             inline float Particle::getDistanceFromCamera() const
00383             {
00384                         return std::sqrt(data->sqrDist);
00385             }
00386 
00387             inline float Particle::getSqrDistanceFromCamera() const
00388             {
00389                         return data->sqrDist;
00390             }
00391 
00392             inline bool Particle::isNewBorn() const
00393             {
00394                         return data->age == 0.0f;
00395             }
00396 
00397             inline bool Particle::isAlive() const
00398             {
00399                         return data->life > 0.0f;
00400             }
00401 
00402             inline void Particle::kill()
00403             {
00404                         data->life = 0.0f;
00405             }

00407             // specialization of the swap for particle
00408             template<>
00409             inline void Pool<Particle>::swapElements(Particle& a,Particle& b)
00410             {
00411                         swapParticles(a,b);
00412             }

00416             // Global functions definitions //
00418 
00419             inline bool isFurtherToCamera(const Particle& a, const Particle& b)
00420             {
00421                         return a.getSqrDistanceFromCamera() > b.getSqrDistanceFromCamera();
00422             }
00423 
00424             // Swaps particle data. Used internally. Do not use with particles that are not from the same group !
00425             extern void swapParticles(Particle& a,Particle& b);
